subtitle: Those who know how to Love...
Those who actually know what Love really is... know that Love
is not separate from the reality to which the word GOD points to... and for those who know what Love is
and are also on this path of spiritual awakening, know that Love is not separate from God
Love, Awakening, God, are all the same thing...
don't get lost in the sound of mere words...
listen with your Heart ~ you cannot awaken without Love! You cannot even begin to comprehend
how existence was made without Love... Love and God is a prerequisite to awakening consciousness
Love and God is a prerequisite to obtaining real Gnosis within your Heart...
Love is the magical ingredient to the Self-Realization of the Soul
Love and only Love is the Supreme Ruler of ALL things within each and every atom of existence...
Love is the Supreme God of every seed, plant, and animal... Love is the supreme God of every gentle
word, affectionate kiss, glance of admiration; every sacrifice of all that which does not serve Love
